casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Riley.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Riley (1988), 36 Ohio St. 3d 601.]

(J.D. No. 87-1 Decided April 6, 1988.) Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur. Holmes, J., dissents. Holmes, J.,

dissenting. In that I conclude that the facts present no violation of the Canons, I would not apply any sanction.
